vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἀμπλιᾶτος (T, -ίατος; Rec. Ἀμπλιᾶς; see MM, VGT, 5.see), -ου, ὁ
Ampliatus: Rom.1:6 8:8.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Rom.16.8
§ Ampliatus, (Proper name), Rom. 16:8*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
暗伯利 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "大的"
一位住在羅馬的基督徒(羅 16:8)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
暗伯利 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "大的"
一位住在罗马的基督徒(罗 16:8)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Am-li-a, người rất yêu dấu của tôi trong Chúa.
